attributes.action: Require council and housing associations to provide Insulation to All there housing stock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the cost of gas and electric bills increasing and with many people in social housing using pre payment meters, there should be a provision in the new measures announced by the goverment to force Landlords of council and housing associations to provide wall insulation to all there properties and were required ensure were this is already existing in proprties be checked and renewed. The measures anonced today do not apply to persons in social housing and in some cases the there tenancy agreements do not allow the tenants to have this done so energy suppliers will not carry out such work on these properties.
